	version=2.60-bugs.debian.org_2005_01_02

Package: karm
Version: 4:3.4.2-2
Severity: important

Karm successfully loads data from data file, continues tracking but... 
failed to save data. It was not so all the time. I don't know when it 
stoped working correctly...

When loading from console it gives the error (when creating or changing 
tasks):
X Error: BadWindow (invalid Window parameter) 3
   Major opcode:  20
   Minor opcode:  0
   Resource id:  0x240013d

lsof (without libs) gives:
$ lsof | grep -i karm | grep -v '/lib/'
karm      3128     s-andy  cwd       DIR        3,3    4096    327145 
/home/sandy
karm      3128     s-andy  rtd       DIR        3,3    4096         2 /
karm      3128     s-andy  txt       REG        3,3  272672    507189 
/usr/bin/karm

[heap] (stat: No such file or directory)
